short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Synchronize your Gmail with your Edda account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily sync your Gmail with your Edda account. Create new deals, contacts, and link emails to existing companies on your pipeline. Keep track of all relevant communications on each company profile.
